jcr:content.jcr:title: List of places in the United Kingdom

contentheadline.headline: List of places in the United Kingdom

contentrichtext.text: <!-- for hierarchy from [[List of places]] --> This is a '''list of places in the United Kingdom'''. ==Cities== There are 66 settlements in the UK with official city status. * [[List of cities in the United Kingdom]] ==Towns== * [[List of towns in England]] * [[List of burghs in Scotland]] * [[List of towns in Wales]] * [[List of towns in Northern Ireland]] ==Lists of places== These lists include all villages, towns and cities. * [[List of United Kingdom locations]] ==Villages== There are categories for [[:Category:villages in England|villages in England]], [[:Category:villages in Northern Ireland|villages in Northern Ireland]], [[:Category:villages in Scotland|villages in Scotland]] and [[:Category:villages in Wales|villages in Wales]]. ==Regions== There is a category for [[:Category:regions of England|regions of England]] ==Other== [[List of Parliamentary constituencies in the United Kingdom]] {{Europe topic|List of places in}} [[Category:Geography of the United Kingdom| ]] [[Category:Lists of places in the United Kingdom| ]]
